en.site_tagline: Professional Cargo Transportation Between China and Poland

hero.title: Your Trusted Partner for China-Poland Cargo Transportation

form.title: Submit Your Inquiry
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you with details
form.inquiry_content_placeholder: Please describe your shipping requirements in detail
form.privacy_consent_text: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy and consent to the processing of my personal data for handling this inquiry, in accordance with PIPL and GDPR.
form.terms_consent_text: I accept the terms of service
form.cross_border_consent_text: I consent to the transfer of my personal data to Poland for the purpose of handling this inquiry
form.success: Thank you! Your inquiry has been submitted successfully.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

form.title: 提交您的询盘
form.description: 请填写下方表格，我们将为您提供详细信息
form.phone_placeholder: 请输入您的电话号码（例如：13712345678）
form.inquiry_content_placeholder: 请详细描述您的运输需求
form.privacy_consent_text: 我已阅读并同意隐私政策，同意为处理此询盘而处理我的个人数据，符合PIPL和GDPR规定。
form.cross_border_consent_text: 我同意将我的个人数据传输到波兰以处理此询盘
